content: hi friends here s a great beginner s project for people starting crochet or those wanting to work on color blocking this pattern guides you through the process of crocheting a checkered square great for coasters or wall art this pattern is designed to be both easy to follow and fun to complete this is a very customizable pattern and an excellent scrap buster so feel free to experiment with different colors and gauges you can use any mm yarn and hook but i recommend sizing down at least 50mm to make the switches appear fuller and less gappy i used 4mm yarn with a 3mm hook i worked each checker in 5 dbc increments but you can go as low as 2 and as high as you d like pattern details skill level beginner time ~30 minutes materials needed 4mm yarn pattern uses two colors but you can do as many or few as you d like 3mm crochet hook darning needle optional scissors or snips what you get instant digital download of the crochet pattern clear row-by-row instructions with helpful tips and clarifications why you ll love it quick and enjoyable perfect for friends and family gifts or furnishing your coffee table/nightstand versatile pattern that can be customized download now and start crocheting your own coasters
